info.ability: Lose one influence. Gain one energy per card that Mukaki's side has.
info.passive: When Makari-Hari's side uses a spell card, draw one card.

info.ability: Lose one influence. Add one cooldown to Makari-Hari and swap hands with Makari-Hari's side.
info.passive: Mukaki's side can play up to two cards in a trial.

info.ability: Remove one energy from Makari-Hari/Mukaki's side.
Remove one card from Makari-Hari/Mukaki's side.
Discard your entire hand and draw two cards. If their elements match, draw two more. Repeat until they don't match. (Extra cards will be discarded)

info.passive: When a trial begins, reveal Makari-Hari's/Mukaki's hand.

info.ability: Swap your hand with random cards from Makari-Hari/Mukaki's hand.

info.passive: Draw three cards from the deck, choose one to keep and return the others to the deck.

info.ability: Pick an element, Makari-Hari/Mukaki's side must discard all cards of that element.
Draw one card, preform two trials only Makari-Hari/Mukaki can participate in.
Take all energy from the hero on Makari-Hari/Mukaki's side. If it's a tie, pick one.
For every hero on Makari-Hari/Mukaki's side with no energy, flip them over to your side.
Makari-Hari/Mukaki's side must submit one card. Conver that card into one energy.

info.passive: When Makari-Hari/Mukaki's side draws a spell card, reveal it and draw another card.

info.ability: Each side must wager their energy, the side with the highest wager draws two cards per energy wagered. (All energy wagered is discarded)

info.passive: When Makari-Hari/Mukaki's side preforms an exchange, its cost is lowered to two cards.

info.ability: Pick an element, convert all cards of that element in your hand to energy.
